resources.string: If activated all Apps will report as installed by Google Play.\nREQUIRES: \"Allow signature spoofing\"

Several Apps are checking the installation source, i.e. if they are installed by Google Play or not.
See https://axpos.org/s for details.

WARNING:
ENABLING THIS SETTING IS HIGHLY EXPERIMENTAL!
READ THE GUIDE BEFORE ENABLING:
https://axpos.org/s
